boardgame.name: SPQR (Deluxe Edition)
SPQR: The Art of War in the Roman Republic
SPQR: The Great Battles of History, Volume II
boardgame.description: SPQR (Deluxe Edition) is a re-working of the classic GMT game of warfare in the age of the Roman Republic, out of print for many years now. The deluxe edition contains the five scenarios, maps and counters from the original SPQR, plus nine additional scenarios (and the requisite maps and counters) taken from various expansion modules. This major revision makes available again a key part of the brilliant Great Battles of History Series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Offered here for your consideration is an opened but otherwise mint copy of the amazing SPQR Deluxe Edition, published by GMT Games. Please read on to learn why I think you should purchase my copy, as opposed to either a brand new one from a retailer or a used one from another seller. I purchased this game in the Fall of 2009 and proceeded to spend several nights cutting out the base game counters (that is, those included in the original edition). For this I used an X-acto blade and a metal cutting triangle, and I made sure to clip off any stray card stock fiber from the corners. The corners are not _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;clipped,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; per se; they are merely groomed. The game also comes with two and a half sheets of counters for the Deluxe Scenario Pack. I left those unpunched and they remain so. My intention was to punch them when I finally needed the counters for these other scenarios, but I never got there. Next I shopped around for a sensible counter storage solution. I tried putting the unit cohorts in small ziplock bags, but I did not like the ergonomic experience. Instead I purchased two Plano StowAway boxes: a 3449-87 for the system-wide control counters, and a 2-3601 for the SPQR units. For the latter, I nicked a few extra divider tabs to create the requisite number of cells. Per the included receipt from Dick_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Sporting Goods, you can see that I spent $8.86 after tax on these two boxes, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including them both with the game. Opening this game fresh from shrink-wrap still presents several challenges before one can play. One must punch, organize, and audit the counter set, and then concoct an appropriate storage solution that will accommodate both set-up time and in-game access needs. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m offering a copy of the game with those problems solved, so that you can open it and begin playing immediately. As I said, my copy is opened, but to call it _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;used_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is stretching the truth. I have only ever unfolded one of the five maps, and I immediately placed it into a Plexiglas/foam core sandwich that I use to protect paper maps during play. I then played one scenario of the game over two solitaire sessions before having to pack it up again. Since then, it has sat boxed (still under the slit shrink-wrap) in a cool cabinet, out of sunlight, waiting for someone to come rescue it. When I opened the box today to photograph its contents, I was astounded once again at how much stuff is in there. This game was clearly a labor of love for GMT: even the typography in the rule and scenario books would warrant owning the printed components, even if you had no intention of playing. As much as I admire the game and enjoyed playing it those few times, I recognize that my understanding of the rules has fled my mind, and that the space in the cabinet could be reclaimed and put to better use with some other game that I might be able to play with my family. My asking price may seem a little high, but again let me remind you that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including the two Plano boxes that retailed for almost $9 two and a half years ago, and these boxes have only ever been put to use to hold the SPQR counters. Also, the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s condition is the same as a new copy, or even arguably better, given that the counters are ready for play. All of the original components are included -- even the GMT-provided ziplock bags, the hand-signed packing slip from GMT, and the sprues for the counters I did punch. I had worked from my own printed copy of the rulebook, so the included books have not suffered any wear. I expect shipping will cost around $10.85 for USPS Priority Mail. The game will fit in one of the pre-paid medium boxes. However, if you have some other preferred shipping method in mind, please let me know and we can figure out what it would cost. In addition to the photos included here, please take the time to look at the THIRTEEN HIGH-RESOLUTION PHOTOS available at the following URL: http://www.panix.com/~seh/pix/spqr [At present, due to a bug with the BGG Marketplace, attaching images doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t work. While the BGG team works on fixing that, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve uploaded the images to my gallery: http://boardgamegeek.com/images/user/96408 Please take a look there. I apologize for the inconvenience.] If you have any questions about the game, please feel free to ask. Thank you for reading.

The Art of War in the Roman Republic. SPQR with Deluxe Scenario Pack. From the Great Battles of History, Vol II (2008 3rd edition) by GMT Games. Fourteen battles. Five backprinted maps. English version. All items are new and in shrink if so delivered by the producer. All items are really on stock. No fake set-up here. No Order on demand. International Customers, Please ask for our precise shipping costs. We ship only fully insured. So ordering only a small pocket game or anything very low priced may come out to be very uneconomical. Methods of payment: -You can always pick the game up at our storage location :-) -We accept all credit cards ! -You can use paypal. (That should be the first choice for non-EU customers) Für unsere deutschsprachigen Kunden: Sie können uns für alle Fragen gerne telefonisch kontaktieren: Tel.: 0201-786877 Die Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands betragen 5,- Euro (inkl. 19% Mwst.). Ab 100€ versenden wir innerhalb Deutschlands Versandkostenfrei. Alle Preise enthalten die gesetzliche Mehrwertsteuer in Höhe von 19%. Bezahlmöglichkeiten für Kunden innerhalb Deutschlands: - Alle Kreditkarten willkommen ! - Paypal - Vorkasse - Rechnung (Nicht für Erstbesteller, wir behalten uns vor die Zahlungsmöglichkeit per Rechnung von Fall zu Fall neu zu bewerten !)
Alternativ ist natürlich auch eine Abholung mit Bar-, EC-, oder Kreditkartenzahlung in unserem Lager möglich. (Im Geschäft wird neben Brettspielen auch eine üppige Auswahl an Rollenspielen angeboten.) Beachten Sie bitte auch unsere Aktionen und weiter Angebote auf: www. fanen.com Widerrufsbelehrung Widerrufsrecht Sie können Ihre Vertragserklärung innerhalb von zwei Wochen ohne Angabe von Gründen in Textform (z. B. Brief oder E-Mail), oder durch Rücksendung der Sache widerrufen. Die Frist beginnt frühestens mit Erhalt dieser Belehrung. Zur Wahrung der Widerrufsfrist genügt die rechtzeitige Absendung des Widerrufs oder der Sache. Der Widerruf ist zu richten an: Fantasy En_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Counter c/o Holger Willert Gudulastr. 5 D(Hofgebäude rechts hinten) 45131 Essen email: fanen@fanen.com Widerrufsfolgen Im Falle eines wirksamen Widerrufs sind die beiderseits empfangenen Leistungen zurückzugewähren. Können Sie uns die empfangene Leistung ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurückgewähren, müssen Sie uns insoweit ggf. Wertersatz leisten. Bei der Überlassung von Sachen gilt dies nicht, wenn die Verschlechterung der Sache ausschließlich auf deren Prüfung - wie sie Ihnen etwa im Ladengeschäft möglich gewesen wäre - zurückzuführen ist. Im Übrigen können Sie die Wertersatzpflicht vermeiden, indem Sie die Sache nicht wie ein Eigentümer in Gebrauch nehmen und alles unterlassen, was deren Wert beeinträchtigt. Sie haben die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, w enn die gelieferte Ware der bestellten entspricht und wenn der Preis der zurückzusendenden Sache einen Betrag von 40 Euro nicht übersteigt, oder wenn Sie bei einem höheren Preis der Sache zum Zeitpunkt des Widerrufs noch nicht die Gegenleistung, oder eine vertraglich vereinbarte Teilzahlung erbracht haben. Anderenfalls ist die Rücksendung für Sie kostenfrei. Nicht paketversandfähige Sachen werden bei Ihnen abgeholt. Verpflichtungen zur Erstattung von Zahlungen müssen Sie innerhalb von 30 Tagen nach Absendung Ihrer Widerrufserklärung erfüllen. Ende der Widerrufsbelehrung
